casebody.data:
PEOPLE ex rel. BURTON v. EARL et al. (Supreme Court, General Term, Second Department. December 1, 1893.) Certiorari by Mary K. Burton against Frederick Earl and others to review an assessment of street improvements. The facts are the same as in the Rudiger Case, 26 N. Y. Supp. 382.

Argued before BARNARD, P. J., and DYKMAN and PRATT, JJ.

Robert P. Getty, Jr., and Chas. F. Moody, for petitioner. David Swits, for respondents. BARNARD, P. J.

The assessment must be reversed under the stipulation of the parties to the appeal that this appeal abide the result of the case of the People ex rel. Rudiger v. Earl, 26 N. Y. Supp. 382, and on the same defense. All concur.
